summary: Add Vincent\\\'s triple barrel gun named Cerberus
descriptionHtml:
This mod add CERBERUS, a triple barrel gun used by vincent from final fantasy

This mod based on flintlock pistol by mikloud 
I only change the pistol model with cerberus
Credit for him
Thanks to lordmaddog buat greget nya
Holy crap! I forgot to put the gun on the game
Shit, false alarm... Mikloud already make it so you can create it on smithery

My other mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30706] Squal Leonhart on skyrim [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29959] Gunblade leonhart [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27521] Sasuke Sword Style [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28348] Rogue Race based on Sasuke sword style [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28779] Itachi and Kisame from Akatsuki [/url]

Thanks, endorse if you like
author: Benk and Mikloud
